properties.body:
EASTERN NORTH ATLANTIC.
DNC 19.
DISTRESS SIGNAL RECEIVED ON 406 MHZ FROM AIRCRAFT
IN 50-06.30N 022-43.02W AT 301021Z MAR.
VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP
LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE. REPORTS TO
UK COAST GUARD, PHONE: 4434 4382 0025,
FAX: 4413 2924 4547, E-MAIL: UKMRCC@HMCG.GOV.UK.
